```{=html}
<h2 class="about-section-title"><i class="bi bi-person-fill"></i> About Me</h2>
```

I'm a graduate student from Taichung, Taiwan, pursuing dual master's degrees in **Data Science** (NCHU) and **Social Data Analytics & Research** (UTD, Dallas), with a B.S. in Applied Mathematics from NCHU. I'm currently looking for a **data science / ML internship**.

Over the past few years I've completed **37 projects** across a wide range of domains ‚Äî from quantum computing and deep learning to medical image segmentation, database design, GIS, and AI agent workflows. I pick up new tools and fields quickly, and I enjoy going deep once I'm in. My current research focuses on **flight delay prediction** for a major U.S. airline, building selective prediction frameworks on 1.1M+ flight records. I'm also working with the **Taichung Education Bureau**, analyzing the relationship between an adaptive learning platform and student performance across 127 classes.

Outside of research, I worked as a **cram-school math/physics/chemistry instructor** and at a **3D printing studio**. I currently serve as a **bilingual teaching assistant** for Calculus, Database Systems, and Quantum Computing.
